text: Calm down, Eddie!

Sorry about that, Lud. But ya’ know, we had to do what was best for the other 7 or so billion people out there. Ludlow nods, sadly, notices Q-Bert.  132 133 134 Numbered Script (04/17/2014) 97.

Sam Brenner, Ludlow Lamonsoff and Eddie Plant are American heroes. World heroes.  135 136 Numbered Script (04/17/2014) 98. The assembled press cheers. Violet turns to Brenner.

Standing in a second floor window, dressed in a negligee, by candlelight, is Jamie Lee Curtis. She gives a flirty w a sexy smile, to Eddie.
